info.name: Zen Bites
info.description: Zen Bites is an Asian-inspired fusion restaurant that offers authentic flavors from across East Asia. We specialize in handcrafted gyoza, rice bowls, teppanyaki noodles, and ramen made fresh daily, along with refreshing desserts and drinks.

menu.description: Handmade Japanese-style dumplings with savory fillings, served with house dipping sauces.

items.name: Beef + kimchee gyoza
items.description: Steamed and served with a zingy yuzu dipping sauce

items.name: Edamame, truffle and pulled shiitake gyoza
items.description: steamed and served with a zingy yuzu dipping sauce

items.name: Yasai gyoza | vegetable
items.description: Steamed green gyoza served with a spiced vinegar dipping sauce

menu.description: Delicious small plates perfect for sharing or enjoying on the side.

items.name: Hot honey fried chicken
items.description: Chicken coated in hot honey + yuzu sauce. topped with mixed pickles and served with a zesty vegan mayo on the side

items.name: Hot honey fried chicken
items.description: Chicken coated in hot honey + teriyaki sauce. topped with mixed pickles and served with a zesty vegan mayo on the side

items.name: Hot honey fried chicken
items.description: Chicken coated in hot honey + firecracker sauce. topped with mixed pickles and served with a zesty vegan mayo on the side

items.name: Koko 'prawn' crackers
items.description: Asian-style crackers tossed in a coconut, chilli and lime salt. served with a sweet chilli sauce on the side

items.name: Chilli squid
items.description: Our iconic crispy fried squid tossed in shichimi spice. served with a chilli + coriander dipping sauce

menu.description: Satisfying rice bowls with flavorful toppings served over a bed of fluffy steamed rice.

items.name: Chicken gochujang rice bowl
items.description: Chicken in a spicy gochujang glaze on a bed of sticky white rice. bok choi. pickled cucumber. snow onion slaw. red + spring onion. red chilli. sesame seeds

items.name: Silken tofu gochujang rice bowl
items.description: Silken tofu in a spicy gochujang glaze on a bed of sticky white rice. bok choi. pickled cucumber. snow onion slaw. red + spring onion. red chilli. sesame seeds

items.name: Beef brisket teriyaki donburi
items.description: Beef in teriyaki sauce on a bed of sticky white rice. shredded carrots. pea shoots. spring onion. sesame seeds. side of kimchee

items.name: Chicken gochujang rice bowl
items.description: Chicken in teriyaki sauce on a bed of sticky white rice. shredded carrots. pea shoots. spring onion. sesame seeds. side of kimchee

items.name: Grilled duck donburi
items.description: Shredded duck in a sweet + spicy teriyaki sauce on a bed of sticky white rice. shredded carrots. mangetout. sweet potato. cucumber. onion. fried egg. side of kimchee

menu.icon: <svg width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 64 64' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path d='M3 28H60C58.8812 38.7278 54.6337 47.7562 44.3847 53.4919V56.968C44.3847 58.6385 43.0479 60 41.4077 60H21.8293C20.1891 60 18.8523 58.6385 18.8523 56.968V53.2408C8.4516 47.8334 3.05689 39.481 3 28Z' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4' stroke-miterlimit='10' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/><path d='M59 3H11' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4' stroke-miterlimit='10' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/><path d='M59 12H11' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4' stroke-miterlimit='10' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/><path d='M15 3V28' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4' stroke-miterlimit='10' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/><path d='M23 3V28' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4' stroke-miterlimit='10' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/><path d='M31 3V28' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='4' stroke-miterlimit='10' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/></svg>
menu.description: Hearty bowls of ramen with rich broth, tender noodles, and a variety of toppings.

items.name: Tantanmen beef brisket ramen
items.description: Slow-cooked korean barbecue beef brisket + ramen noodles in an extra rich chicken broth. menma. kimchee. spring onion. coriander. chilli oil. half a tea-stained egg

items.name: Grilled chicken ramen
items.description: Marinated chicken breast + ramen noodles in a rich chicken broth. pea shoots. menma. spring onion

items.name: Chilli chicken ramen
items.description: Marinated chicken breast + ramen noodles in a spicy chicken broth. onion. beansprouts. coriander. chilli. lime

items.name: Shirodashi pork belly ramen
items.description: Slow-cooked pork belly drizzled with korean barbecue sauce + ramen noodles in a rich chicken broth. pea shoots. menma. wakame. spring onion. half a tea-stained egg

menu.description: Stir-fried noodles made on a sizzling teppan grill, with your choice of protein and vegetables.

items.name: Crispy duck saku saku soba
items.description: Soba noodles cooked in sweet amai sauce. crispy shredded duck egg. beansprouts. leek. chunky spring onion. chilli. spicy teriyaki sauce (may contain small bones)

items.name: Crispy shiitake saku saku soba
items.description: Soba noodles cooked in sweet amai sauce. pulled shiitake. egg. beansprouts. leek. chunky spring onion. chilli. spicy teriyaki sauce

items.name: Chicken + prawn yaki soba
items.description: Soba noodles cooked with chicken. prawn. egg. peppers. beansprouts. onion. pickled ginger. crispy fried onions. sesame seeds.

items.name: Yuzu basque cheesecake
items.description: A soft + creamy baked cheesecake with a zesty yuzu twist. drizzled with sweet passionfruit sauce

items.name: Momo meringue cake
items.description: A crisp baked meringue with a light + airy peach sponge. white chocolate frosting + a sweet raspberry sauce at the centre. served with sour cherry compôte

items.name: White chocolate + ginger cheesecake
items.description: A creamy cheesecake with a biscuit base and a zingy ginger twist. drizzled with a rich toffee sauce and dusted with ginger icing sugar
